Features\n\nThis plugin integrates with [ext[TidGi-Desktop|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/TidGi-Desktop/]]'s Git version history features, allowing you to:\n\n# Search and browse Git commit history\n# View changed files in each commit\n# Inspect historical file content\n# Restore previous versions of tiddlers\n\n!! Requirements\n\n* Requires [ext[TidGi-Desktop|https://github.com/tiddly-gittly/TidGi-Desktop/]] version 0.13.0 or higher\n* Works with Git-backed wikis only\n\n!! Usage\n\nOpen the \"History\" tab in the sidebar to:\n\n# Search Commits: Enter keywords to search commit messages\n# Browse History: View the list of commits with author and date\n# Inspect Changes: Click on a commit to see changed files\n# View Content: Click on a file to see its content at that point in time\n# Restore Version: Use the \"Apply This Version\" button to restore historical content (requires confirmation)\n\nThe historical file content is stored in a temporary tiddler and can be opened in the story river for easy editing or copying.\n\n!! Technical Details\n\nThis plugin uses TidGi-Desktop's exposed Git APIs to query commit history and file content without requiring external Git commands in the wiki context.\n\n"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/source-control-management/style.css":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/source-control-management/style.css","text":".tidgi-scm-history-container{display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:.25rem;height:100%}.tidgi-scm-error{padding:.5rem;border:1px lingo-base() $:/plugins/linonetwo/source-control-management/language/\n\n<!-- Commit List Section -->\n<div class=\"tidgi-scm-commit-section\">\n  <$list filter=\"[[$:/state/scm/viewing-tiddler]get[text]]\" variable=\"viewingTiddler\">\n    \n    <$git-commit-list tiddler=<<viewingTiddler>> search={{$:/state/scm/search}}>\n\n      <!-- Uncommitted Changes (if any) -->\n      <$list filter=\"[[$:/state/scm/has-uncommitted]text[yes]]\">\n        <$eventcatcher $click=\"\"\"<$action-sendmessage $message='tm-scm-load-uncommitted' />\"\"\">\n          <div class={{{ [[tidgi-scm-uncommitted-item]] [[$:/state/scm/selected-commit]text[uncommitted]then[selected]] +[join[ ]] }}}>\n            <div class=\"tidgi-scm-uncommitted-label\"><<lingo CommitList/Uncommitted>></div>\n          </div>\n        </$eventcatcher>\n      </$list>\n\n      <!-- Loading Indicator -->\n      <$list filter=\"[[$:/state/scm/loading]text[yes]]\">\n        <div class=\"tidgi-scm-loading\"><<lingo CommitList/Loading>></div>\n      </$list>\n      \n      <!-- Filter Commits -->\n      <$set name=\"commitsTiddler\" value={{{ [[$:/temp/source-control-management/]addsuffix<viewingTiddler>addsuffix[/commits]] }}}>\n      <$list filter=\"[<commitsTiddler>has[list]]\">\n        <$list filter=\"[list<commitsTiddler>]\" variable=\"commitHash\">\n          <$tiddler tiddler={{{ [[$:/temp/source-control-management/]addsuffix<viewingTiddler>addsuffix[/commit/]addsuffix<commitHash>] }}}>\n          <$eventcatcher $click=\"\"\"<$action-sendmessage $message='tm-scm-load-files' $param=<<commitHash>> />\"\"\">\n            <div class={{{ [[tidgi-scm-commit-item]] [[$:/state/scm/selected-commit]text<commitHash>then[selected]] +[join[ ]] }}}>\n              <div class=\"tidgi-scm-commit-message\"><$text text={{!!text}} /></div>\n              <div class=\"tidgi-scm-commit-meta\">\n                <$text text={{!!author}} /> • <$view field=\"date\" format=\"date\" template=\"YYYY-MM-DD 0hh:0mm:0ss\" />\n              </div>\n            </div>\n          </$eventcatcher>\n        </$tiddler>\n        </$list>\n      </$list>\n      \n        <!-- Empty State -->\n        <$list filter=\"[<commitsTiddler>!has[list]] [<commitsTiddler>get[list]is[blank]] +[limit[1]]\">\n          <div class=\"tidgi-scm-empty\"><<lingo CommitList/Empty>></div>\n        </$list>\n      </$set>\n    </$git-commit-list>\n  </$list>\n</div>\n"},"$:/plugins/linonetwo/source-control-management/FilesSection":{"title":"$:/plugins/linonetwo/source-control-management/FilesSection","type":"text/vnd.tiddlywiki","text":"\\define <!-- Metadata Table -->\n            <$list filter=\"[[$:/state/scm/show-metadata]text[yes]]\" variable=\"null\">\n              <$set name=\"fieldsJson\" tiddler={{{
